messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I'm on AOL and I get lots of yahoogroups mail
messages.msgSnippet: I have a Yahoo addy.....no mail at all yesterday. Mixed up chronologically mixed up posts other days. I unsubbed from some lists and went to digest here and
messages.messageBody:
I have a Yahoo addy.....no mail at all yesterday.

Mixed up chronologically mixed up posts other days. I
unsubbed from some lists and went to digest here and
there tring to smooth it out. Still a mess. Once or
twice I clicked on "save draft" and had a personal
letter, that was in the composition stage, posted! But
not on this list, I don't think.

Still, Yahoo is good about filtering spam.

I have McAffee virus vurus protection.

Sharon

__________________________________________________

messages.subject: I'm on AOL and I get lots of yahoogroups mail
messages.msgSnippet: But who was that message FROM? I m on several yahoogroups lists.  Sometimes a piece of mail doesn t make it through (not just to AOL, to various people
messages.messageBody:
But who was that message FROM?

I'm on several yahoogroups lists. Sometimes a piece of mail doesn't make it
through (not just to AOL, to various people spottily), but it does seem to be
working out okay.


<< For those of you who have AOL and have been having problems getting mail
from yahoogroups, this is the message that was sent to some yahoo list
owners.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----
> ====
> I'm sure that you have heard by now that AOL is not sending mail that
> comes from Yahoogroups. >>



Sandra

"Everything counts."
http://expage.com/SandraDodd
